description: As a user, I want to be able to securely log in to the application so that my data is protected. Acceptance criteria: - Support email/password login - Implement JWT tokens - Add session management - Include password reset flow
comments: Started implementation|Working on JWT integration|Completed authentication flow; ready for review|LGTM - merging to main

summary: Fix memory leak in dashboard component
description: Users are reporting slow performance after using the dashboard for extended periods. Investigation shows memory is not being properly released. Need to fix event listener cleanup and component unmounting.
comments: Reproduced the issue in dev environment|Found the root cause - event listeners not being removed|Fixed and tested - memory usage now stable

description: Users need to export their reports to PDF format. Should support: - Multiple page layouts - Custom headers/footers - Logo/branding - Table of contents
comments: Researched PDF libraries - going with pdfkit|Implemented basic PDF generation|Added customization options|Testing with different report types

description: Need to update all npm packages to address security vulnerabilities identified in the security scan. Priority packages: react
column19: Running security audit|Updated major dependencies|All tests passing after updates

description: As a user, I want to receive real-time notifications for important events so I can respond quickly. Requirements: - WebSocket connection - In-app notifications - Email notifications - Push notifications (future)
comments: Set up WebSocket server|Implemented in-app notification UI|Added email notification service|Load testing completed successfully

summary: API timeout on large dataset queries
description: When users query datasets with more than 10k rows the API times out. Need to implement pagination and optimize database queries.
comments: Added database indexes|Implemented cursor-based pagination|Response time reduced from 30s to 2s

summary: Create admin dashboard for user management
description: Admins need a dashboard to manage users, view analytics, and configure system settings. Features: - User CRUD operations - Role management - Activity logs - System health metrics
comments: Designed UI mockups|Implemented user management table|Added role-based access control|Integrated analytics charts|Final testing and bug fixes

description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment. Should include: - Run unit tests - Run integration tests - Build Docker images - Deploy to staging - Manual approval for production.
comments: Created initial workflow file|Added test jobs|Configured Docker build and push|Set up staging deployment|Production deployment working

description: Users need interactive charts and graphs to visualize their data. Support: - Line charts - Bar charts - Pie charts - Custom date ranges - Export chart images
comments: Evaluated charting libraries - chose Chart.js|Implemented line and bar charts|Added pie charts and customization|Performance optimization for large datasets|User acceptance testing complete

summary: Login fails for users with special characters in email
description: Users with + or . in their email addresses cannot log in. The email validation regex is too restrictive.
comments: Identified the regex issue|Updated validation to RFC 5322 compliant|Tested with various email formats - all working now

description: Internationalize the application to support multiple languages. Phase 1: English Spanish French. Use i18n library and externalize all strings.
comments: Set up i18next framework|Extracted all strings to translation files|Translated to Spanish|Translated to French|Added language switcher UI|QA testing with native speakers

description: Set up daily automated backups of the production database to S3. Include backup rotation policy to keep last 30 days.
comments: Created backup script|Set up S3 bucket with lifecycle policies|Configured cron job|Tested restore procedure

description: Users need to search across all their data with advanced filtering. Support: - Full-text search - Filter by date range - Filter by category - Filter by status - Save search presets
comments: Set up Elasticsearch cluster|Implemented full-text search|Added filter UI components|Implemented saved search presets|Performance testing - sub-second response times

summary: Mobile app crashes on iOS 16 devices
description: Users on iOS 16 are experiencing crashes when opening the notifications screen. Stack trace shows null reference error.
comments: Reproduced on iOS 16 simulator|Found the null check issue in NotificationView|Fixed and tested on multiple iOS versions|Submitted to App Store

summary: Add OAuth integration for Google and Microsoft
description: Allow users to sign in using their Google or Microsoft accounts. Implement OAuth 2.0 flow for both providers. Include account linking for existing users.
comments: Set up OAuth apps in Google and Microsoft consoles|Implemented OAuth flow backend|Added OAuth buttons to login page|Tested account linking|Security review completed

description: Upgrade the frontend from React 17 to React 18. Test for breaking changes and update deprecated APIs. Leverage new concurrent features.
comments: Updated package.json and dependencies|Fixed breaking changes in component lifecycle|Migrated to createRoot API|Tested all major user flows|Performance improved with automatic batching

description: Add comprehensive audit logging to meet compliance requirements. Log: - User actions - Data access - Configuration changes - Export events. Logs should be immutable and queryable.
comments: Designed audit log schema|Implemented logging middleware|Set up dedicated audit database|Created audit log viewer UI|Compliance team review passed

description: Users in different timezones see incorrect dates in the date picker. Need to properly handle timezone conversion and display.
comments: Investigated timezone handling|Switched to UTC for all backend storage|Updated frontend to use user's local timezone|Tested across multiple timezones

summary: Add file upload with drag and drop
description: Users should be able to upload files by dragging and dropping them. Support: - Multiple file upload - Progress indicators - File type validation - Size limits - Preview for images
comments: Implemented drag and drop UI|Added file validation|Implemented upload progress bars|Added image preview|Tested with large files

description: Current Docker image is 2.5GB. Need to optimize using multi-stage builds and alpine base image. Target: under 500MB.
comments: Switched to alpine base image|Implemented multi-stage build|Removed unnecessary dependencies|Final image size: 380MB - 85% reduction

description: Add features for team collaboration: - Shared workspaces - @mentions in comments - Real-time presence indicators - Activity feed - Team member management
comments: Implemented shared workspaces|Added @mention functionality|Working on presence indicators|Activity feed implementation in progress

summary: Add advanced reporting with custom templates
description: Power users need the ability to create custom report templates with: - Custom fields - Conditional formatting - Calculated fields - Schedule automated delivery
comments: Designed template editor UI|Implemented custom field selection|Working on conditional formatting logic

description: Users are hitting rate limits during normal usage. Current limit of 100 req/min is too low. Need to increase and add better error messages.
comments: Analyzed actual usage patterns|Increased limits to 500 req/min|Added rate limit headers|Improved error messages with retry-after|PR ready for review

description: Address security vulnerabilities in dependencies identified by Dependabot. 15 high-priority updates needed.
Add dark mode theme option for the entire application. Should respect system preferences and allow manual toggle. Ensure WCAG AA contrast compliance.
